EmailTemplate.subject: Data and Competitiveness of APJ businesses
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.google.com/url?q=http://v2.decipherinc.com/survey/selfserve/1510/140609?utm_source%3DPivotal%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3DPaaSQ32014&sa=D&usg=ALhdy2-BPJYJ_wVy8r0xTZ4aLYjjppuzVA> Pivotal is conducting a short survey regarding the role of data and how data technology is used by businesses in the Asia Pacific. Please complete the 3 minute survey attached and in return we will send you the completed survey results.
Thank you for your help.
